text.div:
SMARTHealthCardsVaccinationAndTestingIG

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/smarthealthcards-vaccination/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.uv.smarthealthcards-vaccination

name: SMARTHealthCardsVaccinationAndTestingIG
title: SMART Health Cards: Vaccination & Testing Implementation Guide

resource.name: COVID-19-specific Laboratory Bundle - Allowable Data
resource.description: The bundle of resources that represents the clinical content of a digital lab credential record specifically for COVID-19.

resource.name: COVID-19-specific Laboratory Bundle - Data Minimization
resource.description: The bundle of resources that represents the clinical content of a digital lab credential record specifically for COVID-19 data minimization.

resource.name: COVID-19 Laboratory Result Observation Profile - Allowable Data
resource.description:
Profile for reporting COVID-19-related laboratory results indicating current or
previous infection status.

resource.name: COVID-19 Laboratory Result Observation Profile - Data Minimization
resource.description:
Profile for reporting COVID-19-related laboratory results indicating current or
previous infection status. Only elements necessary for Verifiers can be populated.

resource.name: Infectious Disease (Generic) Laboratory Bundle - Allowable Data
resource.description: The bundle of resources that represents the clinical content of a digital lab credential record for a generic infectious disease.

resource.name: Infectious Disease (Generic) Laboratory Bundle - Data Minimization
resource.description: The bundle of resources that represents the clinical content of a digital lab credential record for a generic infectious disease for data minimization.

resource.name: Generic Laboratory Result Observation Profile - Allowable Data
resource.description: Profile for reporting laboratory results indicating current or previous infection status for a disease without a specified laboratory result profile.

resource.name: Generic Laboratory Result Observation Profile - Data Minimization
resource.description:
Profile for reporting laboratory results indicating current or previous infection status for a disease without a specified laboratory result profile.
Only elements necessary for Verifiers can be populated.

resource.name: Vaccination Credential Bundle - Allowable Data
resource.description: The bundle of resources that represents the clinical content of a digital vaccination record.

resource.name: Vaccination Credential Bundle - Data Minimization
resource.description: The bundle of resources that represents the clinical content of a digital vaccination record using data minimization profiles.

resource.name: Immunization Profile - Allowable Data
resource.description: Defines a profile representing a vaccination for a vaccination credential Health Card.

resource.name: Immunization Profile - Data Minimization
resource.description: Defines a profile representing a vaccination for a vaccination credential Health Card. Only elements necessary for Verifiers can be populated.

resource.name: Patient Profile - Allowable Data
resource.description: Slight modification of Patient, with identifier as 0..0 and limited MS.

resource.name: Patient Profile - Data Minimization
resource.description: Only elements necessary for Verifiers can be populated.

resource.name: Vaccine Reaction Observation Profile - Allowable Data
resource.description:
Profile for reporting a reaction to a vaccine.

This profile may not be necessary depending on the use cases for this IG, but it's included for now because
we wanted to have value sets corresponding to all the value sets in the IIS core data elements. In this
profile, VaccinationCredentialVaccineReactionValueSet includes the IIS adverse reaction codes.

resource.name: Vaccine Reaction Observation Profile - Data Minimization
resource.description: Profile for reporting a reaction to a vaccine. Only elements necessary for Verifiers can be populated.

resource.name: COVID-19 laboratory test code value set
resource.description:
Currently includes COVID-19 lab codes via the
[LIVD SARS CoV2 Test Codes value set](https://vsac.nlm.nih.gov/valueset/2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1114.9/expansion).

resource.name: Identity assurance level value set
resource.description: Code representing identity assurance level, based on NIST 800-63-3

resource.name: Laboratory result value set
resource.description:
Currently includes COVID-19 lab result codes based on the conclusive values from the
[LIVD SARS CoV2 Test Result Codes value set](https://vsac.nlm.nih.gov/valueset/2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1114.10/expansion).
Other value sets may be added in the future.

resource.name: Funding source value set
resource.description: Funding source for the vaccine

resource.name: Secondarily reported record source value set
resource.description: Source of secondarily reported records

resource.name: Adverse reaction value set
resource.description: Codes describing reactions to vaccinations

resource.name: Vaccination route value set
resource.description: How vaccine entered the body

resource.name: Body site for vaccine administration value set
resource.description: Body site vaccine was administered

resource.name: Value set for identifying vaccines
resource.description: Includes [CVX codes](https://www2.cdc.gov/vaccines/iis/iisstandards/vaccines.asp?rpt=tradename) to identify specific vaccinations.

resource.name: Temporary CVX code system
resource.description: Temporary CVX code system to add missing codes to http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/cvx from the canonical list at https://www2.cdc.gov/vaccines/iis/iisstandards/vaccines.asp?rpt=tradename).

resource.name: Identity Assurance Code System
resource.description: Code representing identity assurance level, based on NIST 800-63-3
